set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(DCMTK_BUILD_APPS OFF)
add_subdirectory(dcmtk)

foreach(lib
  dcmdata
  dcmdsig
  dcmimage
  dcmimgle
  dcmjpeg
  dcmnet
  dcmpstat
  dcmqrdb
  dcmsr
  dcmtls
  dcmwlm
  ijg8
  ijg12
  ijg16
  oflog
  ofstd
  )
  itk_module_target(${lib}) # NO_INSTALL)
endforeach()
